QuestData.Title: The Blade of the Primus
QuestData.Description:
That's everything I need. Time to get to work.
I'd stay close, if I were you. Forging a weapon is never a simple task when the Primus's handiwork is involved.
If he taught me anything, it was to expect the unexpected.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Bonesmith Heirmir forge your runeblade.
QuestData.RewardText: The Primus was always fond of his trials. It seems you've passed this one. Well done.
